name: XM45 (gamejam project)
description:
Kill the Christmas spirits and collect your gift, but don't get sleigh'd in the process!

Standard FPS controls (WASD, mouselook, shift to sprint, scrollwheel to switch weapons, etc.) The engine is based on a pre-release version of RSOD.

Developed for and submitted to 7dfps 2022 and Constructive Criticism Jam.
